org.qbroker.jms

Class TextEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qbroker.event.Event
      • org.qbroker.jms.JMSEvent
        • org.qbroker.jms.TextEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.jms.Message, javax.jms.TextMessage, Event

    public class TextEvent
extends JMSEvent
implements javax.jms.TextMessage
    TextEvent is an Event that implements JMS TextMessage
    Author:
    yannanlu@yahoo.com
